required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Evaluation of the Learning Curve in Low Anterior Resection for Rectal Resection With the Two Surgical Robots
clinical_study.official_title: Accelerated Learning Curve in Low Anterior Resection for Rectal Resection, a New Surgical Robot Micro Hand S Versus da Vinci, Can be Attained Simultaneously: a Single Center Experience

lead_sponsor.agency: The Third Xiangya Hospital of Central South University

clinical_study.source: The Third Xiangya Hospital of Central South University

brief_summary.textblock: Central South University in collaboration with Tianjin University developed the first domestically produced Chinese minimally invasive surgical (MIS) robot system which named "Micro Hand S" in 2013. This new MIS robot had been authorized to enter the clinical trial stage by the Ethics Committee of the Third Xiangya Hospital at Central South University. The Micro Hand S robot is safe and feasible in the preliminary study. However, the learning curve in low anterior resection for rectal resection with the Micro Hand S robot are unclear and whether the two surgical robots (Micro Hand S and da Vinci) shared a similar learning curve and the two robot can be trained simultaneously. Therefore, the investigators conduct this retrospective study to focus on this concern.

detailed_description.textblock: The Micro Hand S robor has been appiled in low anterior resection for rectal cancer. The safey and feasibility has been evaluated. However, the learning curve of this procedure is unclear. Specially,whether the two surgical robots (Micro Hand S and da Vinci) shared a similar learning curve and the two robot can be trained simultaneously are unclear.Therefore, this srudy is conducted to evaluate the learning curve of the two robots in low anterior resection.

primary_outcome.description: It was defined the cumulative sum plot of the consloe time in the chronological order.
It was defined the cumulative sum plot of the docking time in the chronological order.
It was defined the cumulative sum plot of the docking time in the chronological order.

secondary_outcome.description: It was defined as what type of procedure was pferformed, for example, low anterior, abdominal perineal resection
It was defined as the duration from skin incision to skin closure
The console time was defined the fime that the surgeon performed the surgeon console.
The docking time was the time from moving robotic instruments in the surgical field to setting robotic arms into the port sites
Conversion was defined as any change in strategy to open surgery
It was defined as the amount of blood in the whole surgical time
It was defined as the length of hospital stay
It was defined as ileostomy which diverted the feces to to ensure anastomotic healing
It was defined as the number of all the lymph nodes for each patient

Surgical failure was defined as the presence of one or more of the following four parameters: conversion, the positive surgical margins, severe postoperative complications, the number of harvested lymph nodes less than 12
It was defined as the pathological stage of the tumor according the TNM classification
It was defined as the longitudinal diameter of the tumor
It was defined as the distance betwen the distal resection margin and the low margin of the tumor
It was defined as whether the distal and circumferential resection margins was involved the tumor cell under microscope
The quality of the speciman was graded according to the protocol proposed by Quirke
It was defined as the adverse events after operation and the complications were classfied according to the Clavien-Dindo (C-D) classification
It was defined as the tumor was again found in the pelvic cavity
It was defined as the duration between the operation and date of the tumor recurrence

arm_group.description: This group is consisted of 56 cases performed using the Micro Hand S robot and da Vinci robot by one single surgeon in low anterior resection for rectal cancer
This group is consisted of 56 cases performed using the da Vinci robot by one single surgeon in low anterior resection for rectal cancer

intervention.intervention_name: Micro Hand S robot and da Vinci robot
intervention.description: The surgeries are performed with the Micro Hand S robot and da Vinci robot
The surgeries are performed with the da Vinci robot

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- histologically confirmed rectal cancer; ASA score ≤ 3
Exclusion Criteria:
- palliative resections, combined resections, distant metastasis, a previous history of abdominal/or pelvic surgery

facility.name: The Third Xiangya Hospital of Central South University
